entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 1:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
Temperature: 9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 28 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: W 25 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 11 except 6 along parts of the coast.
